content: icebreaker this pattern is designed to to fit two sizes -1- us 7-8 us 8-9 size uk 4 5-5 uk 5-6 eu 37-38 eu 38-39 foot circumference 8 5-8 75 in 8 7- 9 5 in 22-22 5 cm 22-24 cm foot length 9-9 17 in 9 17-9 5 in 23-23 5 cm 23 5-24cm yarn needles schachenmayr regia 4 ply us 2 5 uk 11 eu 3 mm 75 % virgin wool 25% polyamid gauge 10 stitches and 15 row for 2x2 100 g = 420 m /437 yards inches / 5x5 cm in colour 04291 lot 790 stockinette/stocking stitch knitted with two strands held froehlich 4 ply together 75 % virgin wool 25% polyamid notions stitch marker tapestry needle 100 g = 420 m / 437 yards circular needle dpns color 20 lot 223 abbreviations k-knit p-purl st-stitch sts-stitches sl-slip k2tg- knit 2 together p2tg- purl 2 together ssk- slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knitwise knit the 2 slipped stitches together through the back loop tbl-through the back loop rs - right side ws wrong side pattern socks are knit using two strands of yarn cuff cast on with 48 sts + 1 st to join in the round long tail cast on divide the stitches onto four needles -2- rounds 1-22 keep working in the round k1 *p2 k2* repeat k1 don t change the order of knits and purls it s important for maintaining the symmetry of the heel heel divide your stitches evenly in half 24 sts for the heel 24 sts for the instep divide the sole part too as you can see in the picture count 9 sts from the beginning of the round place a marker place another marker after the next 6 sts there are 9 sts left start working at the beginning of the round don t forget you start with k1 p2 k2 work 9 sts in 2x2 rib st slip the marker make 1 left work 6 more sts in the pattern and make 1 right before the marker slip the marker continue working until the end of this round next round is plain make two increases in every second round increase always after the first marker and before the second marker make 1 left after the first marker and make 1 right before the second marker continue to increase like this until there are 30 sts between the markers you can use circular needles too make 1 left → https //youtu be/7jx0bummteq make 1 right → https //youtu be/5kcua7wxwiq -3- increasing sts will disrupt the rib stitch for those who might have difficulties to figure out how the extra sts fit into the pattern i write it down in detail below you can see how the sts follow between the two stitch markers round 1 make two increases round 2 k1 p2 … p2 k1 round 3 make two increses round 4 k2 p2 p2 k2 here you have 4 k sts next to each other
